topic: limit to # of materials in -aE file
body:
Hi,


There seems to be a limit to the number of materials that can be listed 
in a file for use with the -aE option. It looks like it is 128 lines. Is 
this fixed? Can it be adjusted at compile time? Can multiple exclude 
files be used?


-Jack




#	John E. de Valpine
#	president

#	visarc incorporated
#	http://www.visarc.com
